item.title: Cybersecurity Center for Secure Evolvable Energy Delivery Systems (SEEDS)
item.description:
The goal of the Cybersecurity Center for Secure Evolvable Energy Delivery Systems (SEEDS) is to conduct research and develop innovative cybersecurity technologies, tools, and methodologies that advance the energy sectorâ€™s ability to survive cyber incidents while sustaining critical functions.

Funding Agency: SEEDS
